overview_summary: All five neighboring landowners are private residents with no documented stances on development or energy projects. None hold public office or lead civic groups, suggesting limited direct influence. Engagement will require personal outreach and listening to understand any concerns.

neighbors.name: Daniel Corey Richey
neighbors.claims: Daniel C. Richey’s name appears in multiple South Carolina property transactions, indicating he owns real estate in the area ([www.realtyhop.com](https://www.realtyhop.com/property-records/search/daniel-richey#:~:text=There%20are%20currently%2068%20property,South%20Lake%20Mortgage%20Bankers%20In)). He is not listed on any Anderson County boards or committees (a different person with the Richey surname serves on a local water board) ([thejournalonline.com](https://thejournalonline.com/2023/12/21/anderson-county-legislative-delegation-approves-pard-funding-and-board-appointments/#:~:text=The%20reappointments%20of%20James%20Herron%2C,Dickie%20Smith%2C%20Jim%20Simpson%20and)).

approach_recommendations.engage: Initiate a one-on-one conversation through a mutual acquaintance, emphasizing open dialogue since his views are not known.

neighbors.name: Juanita G. Creamer
neighbors.claims: Juanita G. Creamer, 81, resides on Skyland Drive in Belton, Anderson County ([www.simplecontacts.com](https://www.simplecontacts.com/state/SC/Belton/Skyland-Drive#:~:text=Juanita%20Creamer)). There is no public record of her involvement in local government or any development-related debates in the community ([andersonobserver.squarespace.com](https://andersonobserver.squarespace.com/news/?currentPage=1131#:~:text=,DateFriday%2C%20October%2016%2C%202009%20at)).

approach_recommendations.engage: Have a trusted neighbor or community elder reach out informally, focusing on building rapport and understanding any concerns she may have.

neighbors.name: Kimberly Denise Milam & Anthony Tyler Milam
neighbors.claims: Kimberly D. Milam and Anthony T. Milam purchased their Anderson County parcel in October 2017 ([www.realtyhop.com](https://www.realtyhop.com/property-records/search/milam-kimberly-s#:~:text=2017)). They have no evident public profile in Anderson County; neither appears in local news or civic records regarding land use issues ([www.newspapers.com](https://www.newspapers.com/newspage/813708567/#:~:text=Anderson%20Independent,Carnes%2C%20Willie%20Albert)).

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage this couple in a neighborly manner, perhaps at a community gathering, and address any practical questions they have about nearby development.

neighbors.name: Charles Dean Gillespie
neighbors.claims: Charles D. Gillespie (born 1949) is 75 years old and has lived at 1313 Old Gantt Mill Road in Anderson since the early 1990s ([www.menstoppingviolence.org](https://www.menstoppingviolence.org/people/charles-gillespie/#:~:text=Charles%20Gillespie%2C%20born%20on%20December,This%20person%20has%205%20relatives)). He has made no public comments on development, and no record was found of him taking part in local civic issues or meetings ([thejournalonline.com](https://thejournalonline.com/2023/12/21/anderson-county-legislative-delegation-approves-pard-funding-and-board-appointments/#:~:text=The%20reappointments%20of%20James%20Herron%2C,Dickie%20Smith%2C%20Jim%20Simpson%20and)).

approach_recommendations.engage: Leverage his long community tenure by having a respected local figure initiate contact; emphasize that his experience and any concerns are valued.

neighbors.name: Richard L. Wilson & Marilyn Y. Wilson
neighbors.claims: Richard L. Wilson and his wife Marilyn Y. Wilson are co-owners of a residential parcel in Anderson County ([andersonrecords.org](https://andersonrecords.org/property-records#:~:text=Anderson%20County%2C%20South%20Carolina%20Property,These)). There is no indication that either holds a public position or has spoken out on local development matters (their names do not surface in Anderson County civic records) ([www.locatefamily.com](https://www.locatefamily.com/W/WIL/WILSON-22955.html#:~:text=Locate%20WILSON%20Family%20Members%20,Leave%20messageView%20Map)).

approach_recommendations.engage: Reach out in person with a polite introduction, possibly accompanied by a mutual neighbor, to discuss the project and invite their questions or input.
